_comment: Orca Slicer Profile - ASA-GF Strength & Speed for Qidi Q2
quality_notes: Strength & Speed profile: 270°C nozzle for maximum layer bonding
6 wall loops provide excellent structural rigidity for box walls
40% Gyroid infill for high strength-to-weight ratio
10mm brim prevents corner lifting (ASA-GF is warp-prone)
Flow ratio 1.03 slightly over-extrudes for density and layer bond
0-10% fan only — ASA-GF needs minimal cooling for adhesion
60°C chamber temperature — keep enclosure sealed during print
Use hardened steel nozzle — glass fiber destroys brass nozzles
Allow parts to cool slowly in chamber to reduce warping

print_orientation.base_tray: Print upright (opening facing up) - no supports needed
print_orientation.upper_tray: Print upright (opening facing up) - no supports needed
